actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.

official_title: To resolve certain conveyances under the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act related to Cape Fox Corporation, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides for the conveyance of lands located near Ketchikan, Alaska, to the Cape Fox Corporation (Cape Fox). Makes certain lands eligible for selection by Cape Fox for a 24-month period. Provides for the direct conveyance of a certain parcel of land. Waives the core township requirement for certain non-productive lands. Allows Cape Fox to be credited for reconveyance of a certain parcel of land that includes the Beaver Falls Hydroelectric power-house site. Makes available certain parcels of land to Cape Fox for its homesite program.

titles.title: To resolve certain conveyances under the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act related to Cape Fox Corporation, and for other purposes.
